channel.title: Omg still not fixed please help!111
channel.description:
help ppl in my run server in the middle when everyone is on this appears then everyone is logged out please help!!!!! :
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 24 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:850) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:27722) at client.process(client.java:14062) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:46)

item.title: Omg still not fixed please help!111
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

there’s 2 things to get rid of this.

A. Undo what you tried to change. You had to have changed something, or else it wouldnt’t happen

B. YouDownloaded, a source hat had a bug in it.

Read full topic
